attributes.title: SO BUGGY
attributes.review: omg the glitches on this app are terrible, it mentions putting america’s workers first and all the good work trump has done for this country and it made some big typos, americas workers is actually supposed to be “white cis straight males” and the good work should’ve been spelled “blinding the public by controlling the media and spreading false information and giving no evidence to any of his claims” you take our app and we take yours :)

attributes.title: WOULD LEAVE 0 STARS IF AVAILABLE
attributes.review: honestly, this isn’t apart of the gen z joke, i swear. When i open the app, it asks for my phone number. i am NOT trying to be tracked by the government!!!!!!!!!!! UGH. But i did it bc whatever🙄 and then it CRASHED. and WOULD NOT open back up without crashing. i hope this “news” app gets deleted bc it is filled with bugs. now they’re tracking me and probably put viruses on my phone!!!!!!!!

attributes.title: Huge depression

attributes.title: Not worth downloading
attributes.review: Really slow and makes my phone laggggggg!!😖😖Was disappointed but not surprised having this pres. be a billionaire and all😡 not to mention the ads it has about spray tans and toupees🤢 do not download it’s a waste of space and time. attributes.title: no
attributes.review: when i downloaded this app it wouldn’t open and my entire phone crashed. once i did get my phone back on there were at least 6 viruses on it and nothing would work. i had to get a new phone and then i proceeded to download the app again and the same thing happened. this is my third phone and i would just like to say that bunker boys app is trash.  BLM.

attributes.title: Worst app to ever exist
attributes.review: so starting with the fact I opened the app and saw the worst sight in history, so bad in fact my poor eye were strained. so now not only have my eyes given up but THEN I realized the thing that made my eyes STOP working is the same thing that taking away TIKTOK, the audacity. now let’s just say this right here isnt all the reason for this review... this cheeto is a scaredy cat... yes I said it a scaredy cat! he can’t take the heat of Gen Z!

attributes.title: AWFUL!!!!🤦‍♀️🤦‍♀️🤦‍♀️
attributes.review: my phone worked perfect until this was downloaded as soon as I opened the app and saw Donald trumps face my screen literally cracked the programmers on my phone probably thought it was an Oompa Loompa💀💀 so I really think if you want your phone to break then this app is great for you but I personally really like my phone so think this app is awful I never want to see his face again🤦‍♀️😒🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢

attributes.title: A Disgrace
attributes.review: I have a brand new iphone 11 with all the bells and whistles; but as soon as i downloaded this app the quality of my phone began to deteriorate. it started glitching and would randomly turn off in the times i needed it most. I contacted the trump administration to see if they could fix it but instead i was told that “all phones matter” and that i needed to stop complaining about mine!!

attributes.title: The app is HORRIBLE 🤡
attributes.review:
The orange idiot (Donald trump) is trying to take away the only thing that keeps me happy, TikTok.
